bibl.title: On Provenances: The Case of P. Köln XI 448.

series.title: Recherches et Rencontres. Publications de la Faculté des Lettres de Genève.

bibl.note: P. Köln XI, 448 belongs to the cartonnage material acquired on the antiquities market in the 1970s and 1980s, extracted by Michael Fackelmann, then distributed among several papyrus collections. There exists a good possibility that the common provenance is el-Hibeh.

bibl.title: Actes du 26e Congrès international de papyrologie. Genève, 16-21 août 2010.

bibl.seg: Falivene Maria Rosaria, On Provenances: The Case of P. Köln XI 448.

Paul Schubert (Éd.), Actes du 26e Congrès international de papyrologie. Genève, 16-21 août 2010 = Recherches et Rencontres. Publications de la Faculté des Lettres de Genève. 30 (Genève, 2012) pp. 221-227.

P. Köln XI, 448 belongs to the cartonnage material acquired on the antiquities market in the 1970s and 1980s, extracted by Michael Fackelmann, then distributed among several papyrus collections. There exists a good possibility that the common provenance is el-Hibeh.
